website_summaries.verdict: Now that Blu-ray has become the pre-eminent high-definition standard for discs, the Xbox 360 has yet to support it, but it still remains an excellent game console with a superior game library and online experience.
pros: excellent online gaming and communications via Xbox Live
plays hundreds of (but not all) original Xbox titles
doubles as a superior digital media hub and Windows Media Center extender
online Marketplace allows for easy purchases of downloadable full-scale games, minigames, movies, and TV shows
latest version offers HDMI output with 1080p support
new processor runs cooler and quieter
cons: No support for next-generation HD discs, like Blu-ray
early versions of the console prone to "red ring of death" system crash
online gaming require a paid subscription to Xbox Live

customer_reviews.title: false advertising it was not a jasper
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a jasper mother board x-box, so since I already had games power supplies etc. I wanted the same to replace it. come to find out it is a older falcon mother board. and it glitches occasionally. shuts off right in the middle of battle, so i freeze it with pause button until the screen comes back.
customer_reviews.author: Barry2b2

customer_reviews.title: Slightly false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Got everything in the description and got it two days earlier than expected. The only reason I did not rate 5 stars is because the model I got was a Falcon and not a Jasper like it was advertised. I am able to mod it still which is why I bought it, so I'm not really complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: It works good😒⬛
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the proper xbox.or the controller that was supposed to come with it. 😣😤👿Got a power cord and HDMI that wasn't supposed to and the black xbox😣😢....
customer_reviews.author: Greasemonkey4vw

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with proper cables
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the proper cables. The cable to power up the Xbox is useless for this Xbox console so there is no way to even play with it . Waste of money to buy the console if I can't play my games.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with my purchase at first I was mad because I was under the impression it came with controller I guess my seller didn't. Also the disc drive malfunctioned a few times.. Other than that I had fun playing GTA 5 and Red Dead Redemption.
customer_reviews.author: KingDawud7

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: when i tried to turn this item on, it turned on perfectly, but the hinge was broken to the point where i couldn’t put any discs in there. as well as the hdmi cord didn’t fit in the hole it belonged in.
customer_reviews.author: Yadira

customer_reviews.title: Bad conceal
customer_reviews.text: It comes on but it won't connect, plus one of the bay doors was broken. And now there's a new game in it and it won't eject it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented unit
customer_reviews.text: When I order this unit, it said complete but was missing controls. I fill I got a bad deal, misrepresented product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for an Xbox 360
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value and I am very pleased with it. My Xbox finally died after several years of use and I have all this Xbox 360 games that were useless since you can't play most of them on Xbox One anymore. I needed to get a new Xbox 360, but buying a refurbished for almost the same price made no sense when you could get a new one with a 60GB hard drive for a few bucks more. Great sales people, and I am really glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Melody's Emporium

customer_reviews.title: Piece of shit
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 2 months, wont read games, freezes when turning on, i want my money back
customer_reviews.author: KillaBoneZ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got a slim for christmas and bought this one for my other house. I enjoy this system immensley. Its a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: bubbles

customer_reviews.title: RROD on arrival!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dead, though well-packaged: the dreaded '3-ring' RROD. 95% of the time, this can't be fixed! Also, the USB cover on the front panel won't stay closed. Spring is missing or broken. C'mon guys - plug 'em in and check them before you ship! Now I have to wait another couple of weeks for my friend, who bought he console for me as payment for an art comission, to get back from sea duty, before it can be refunded or replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Alister Harrison

product_meta.title: Microsoft Xbox 360 Go Pro Console Bundle (Original & Rare White Jasper)
product_meta.description: Xbox 360 60GB Pro System. Includes an external 60GB hard drive, one controller, headset, a power adapter, component cable, network cable. Games not included
feature_bullets: Also includes: (1) Controller, Power Adapter, Headset, Network Cable and Component Cable
